meanings.definition: A facial expression indicating pleasure, favor, or amusement, typically with the corners of the mouth turned up and the front teeth exposed.
meanings.sent1: She greeted me with a warm smilie when I arrived.
meanings.sent2: His smilie brightened up the room and made everyone feel happy.
meanings.sent3: The baby's smilie was contagious, causing everyone to grin back.
meanings.sent4: Even in tough times, her smilie never faded, like a ray of sunshine.
meanings.sent5: His genuine smilie was like a beacon of joy in a sea of gloom.

meanings.definition: A representation of a smiling face, typically used in electronic communication to convey emotion.
meanings.sent1: She sent me a cute smilie in the text message.
meanings.sent2: The email was full of colorful smilies expressing happiness.
meanings.sent3: The smilie in the chat made the conversation more cheerful.
meanings.sent4: His favorite smilie was the one with heart-shaped eyes.
meanings.sent5: The smilie on the screen seemed to wink playfully at her.
